enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: NUQ: Seats are reserved for Sophomore and Freshmen only.
title: DOHA ENGLISH 242-0-70 Topics in Literature:

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course will explore styles, structures, narrative choices, and points of view of travel writing. Students will consider the role of the traveler, place, and experience in narrative texts. Students will compose their own travel narratives in this course as well other assignments, while improving their descriptive and narrative techniques in the process. Course readings will include travel tales written by curious tourists, explorers, and survivors.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
• Prerequisites: None

  • Open to freshmen and sophomores

  • Open for Cross-Registration

subject: ENGLISH
